version_description:
Latest functions:
- New offers: Keep abreast with latest exclusive offers and promotional events
- Attractive event: Event highlights make you feel like being in the scene
- Fabulous movie: Pick the movie now showing any time
- My Preference: Save your favorite shops, offers and event in place
- Weather info: Keep you updated with instant weather info
- Friends sharing: Share recommended shops, offers and event to friends

Latest functions:
- New offers: Keep abreast with latest exclusive offers and promotional events
- Attractive event: Event highlights make you feel like being in the scene
- Fabulous movie: Pick the movie now showing any time
- My Preference: Save your favorite shops, offers and event in place
- Weather info: Keep you updated with instant weather info
- Friends sharing: Share recommended shops, offers and event to friends

Latest functions:
- EV Charger: In-app payment service for electric car charging
- Personalized promotion: Bookmark your favourite shops and restaurants to receive promotion message by turning on Bluetooth in malls

Latest functions:
- EV Charger: In-app payment service for electric car charging
- Personalized promotion: Bookmark your favourite shops and restaurants to receive promotion message by turning on Bluetooth in malls

Addition of e-event pass of The Point by SHKP
Enhanced features of Eat E-asy and Movies on Show

Enhanced feature: Members can upload move tickets for points registration, no more electronic payment slip.
